import React from "react"; import data from '../data/reviews.json'; import { FiPlay } from "react-icons/fi"; const Video = ({isBg}) => { const {ctav4} = data; return(

{ctav4.title}

{ctav4.subtitle}

{ctav4.text}

{ctav4.btnText}
{ctav4.videoURL === "" ? ( "" ) : ( <>
)}
) } export default Video;
